name: Iced Latte
description: When an iced coffee craving happens, you will be ready. Make coffee in a French Press and freeze into ice cubes in an Iceberg Mold for 4 hours.

ingredients.name: coffee ice cubes
ingredients.additionalInstruction: made in the Iceberg Mold (large cubes)

preparation: Heat milk in the microwave for 1 minute. Froth in a milk frother.
Place coffee ice cubes in a tall glass. Pour frothed milk on top.
Top with whole food sprinkle to taste and enjoy!
